package.name: QuickConnect
package.shortDescription: Pinning contacts in the App Switcher and Lock Screen mimicking iOS 14.

descriptionlist.description:
- Pin contacts at the top or bottom of the Program Switcher and access them from anywhere in the system! Call, send SMS or WhatsApp in the easiest way.
- Replace the boring camera or flashlight buttons on the lock screen with a phone icon and pin your favorite contacts to it for the easiest and fastest way to access them.
